ext_descriptions.ext_description: The alternative_solution_requires_solution_definition rule constrains every instance of product_definition_formation, that is a version of a product of category 'alternative solution', to have exactly one definition of type 'alternative definition'. This rule corresponds to the restriction for alternative solutions of the rule complex_product_requires_product_definition, defined in ISO 10303-214.

There shall not be any product_definition_formation, formation of a product of category 'alternative solution', that is not referred to by exactly one product_definition whose name of frame_of_reference is 'alternative definition'.

The restrict_solution_category rule constrains every instance of product_definition of type 'alternative definition' to be a definition of a product of category 'alternative solution'. This rule corresponds to the restriction for alternative solutions of the rule restrict_product_definition_context_for_product, defined in ISO 10303-214.
There shall not be any product_definition, whose name of frame_of_reference is 'alternative definition', that is not a definition of a product of category 'alternative solution'.
